articles.title: Bulk of Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine arriving in July, says presidential adviser - INQUIRER.net
articles.description: MANILA, Philippines — The bulk of COVID-19 vaccines from American firm Moderna may arrive in the country by July, Presidential Adviser for Entrepreneurship Joey Concepcion said
articles.content:
(REUTERS)
MANILA, Philippines The bulk of COVID-19 vaccines from American firm Moderna may arrive in the country by July, Presidential Adviser for Entrepreneurship Joey Concepcion said Monday.

articles.author: Lin Weiwen
articles.title: How an ex-Singapore resident went from banker to winemaker - CNA
articles.description: Searching for a different pace of life, Cambridge-educated Tai-Ran Niew left a lucrative career in investment banking in Asia to pursue winemaking in America. Today, he grows Chardonnay and embraces a minimalistic way of farming.

articles.title: Anglo’s SA coal spinoff will be listed on Monday. According to a short-seller, it's worth zero - News24
articles.description: Anglo American’s South African coal mines, which will be listed in a new vehicle on the JSE on Monday.

articles.title: Sisters aged 9 and 4 crashed a car they stole because they wanted to 'swim with dolphins' - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The parents of two American girls were horrified and shocked to learn their kids had sneaked out of the family home in West Jordan in Utah in the middle of the night.
articles.content: Two young American girls stole their parents' car so that they could drive from Utah to California, a distance of over 1,000 kilometres, to go to the beach and "swim with dolphins," authorities said.… [+2937 chars]
